data.message: Sunday night would be brill as me and my friend Love Mabel, Stefflon Don and James Hype, we are big fans have tried everything to get tickets, I just missed out on Tuesday, and also Thursday, I went for the first time in 6 years I got to go to the Summertime ball, really want to win tickets for my friends birthday as it’s her 50th, and she’s has never been, she really really wants to go so I would love to Win for her 🙏
